He...

makes me smile..
makes me feel pretty..
makes me feel safe..
makes me feel comfortable with him..

He just makes me feel like im the only girl in the world!

The perfect Boyfriend

• give her one of your t-shirts to sleep in.
• leave her cute text notes.
• tell her she looks beautiful.
• look into her eyes when you talk to her.
• let her mess with your hair.
• touch her hair.
• just walk around with her.
• FORGIVE her for her MISTAKES.
• look at her like she's the only one you see.
• tickle her even when she says stop.
• when she starts swearing at you, tell her you love her.
• let her fall asleep in your arms.
• get her mad, then kiss her.
• stay on the phone with her even if shes not saying anything
• when she is talking listen to her.
• tease her and let her tease you back.
• stay up all night with her when she's sick.
• watch her favorite movie with her.
• give her the world.
• let her wear your clothes.
• when she's sad, hang out with her.
• let her know she's important.
• kiss her in the pouring rain.
• when you fall in love with her, tell her.
• and when you tell her, love her like you've never loved
someone before.
• and,when she runs up at you crying...the first thing you say is..."who's ass am i beating today?"

It reminded me twice that I was alive
And it reminded me that you’re so worth the fight

Something infinitely interesting

Idk..

why do girls always choose the guy that treats them like shit. The guy who doesnt listen to them or their needs. The guy who is so selfish and wants it only if it benefits him and his needs?

I wonder if girls know that their is a guy out there who wants to treat them like the Queens they are? I know there is one out there for me...and i let him go. I think about him still...I love the guy im with...but sometimes i have to tell him what to do. Like just to do something nice i have to tell him. Is that all guys or just mine? I love him with all my heart and soul i do. But it just gets tiring. I dont know maybe im just dumb. Yeah thats it im just dumb.

WOW!

The responce i got from my blog last night is amazing! I never thought id get so many opinions. I know the guy im with right now is a really good guy! I do love him! I love him with all my heart and i know he has flaws i have flaws every one has them. If you dont then your stupid and you have no life! lol...but honestly Do all girls have to tell their boyfriends what to do? Do all girls have to say hey its time to either make a commitment or just tell me its going no where and there is no point to this relationship? Im just scared that im going to be in a 6 year relationship with him and end up never going anywhere with him. Like i said I love him with all my heart he makes me soo happy! Just the thought of him makes me happy..IDK!

Oh well i mean im too young...im not married he has proposed but all i got is a sterling silver band. I mean i know its a symbol of his love for me but its not permanent right now. So...IDK! UUGGGHHH!!! maybe im just selfish.

Am I?
I dont care what yall say just be honest. Im in need of some humbling comments!

Hello to the 2 friends that i do have. How are yall today? Well anyways,
